title: Precipitate size evolution in an ultrafine-grained magnesium-manganese alloy
summary: Precipitate size evolution during room temperature high-pressure torsion (HPT) of a Mg-1.35wt.%Mn alloy was studied using scanning transmission electron microscopy (STEM) and Small-/Wide-angle X-ray scattering (SAXS/WAXS). The volume fraction of the nm-scale $α$-Mn particles increased with applied strain, however small angle X-ray scattering (SAXS) indicated that the majority of manganese remained in solution even after 10 HPT rotations, indicating that the reaction progress is still limited by the diffusivity of Mn. Analysis of the precipitate size distribution determined that the mean particle size did not increase over the course of HPT. This, in combination with the precipitate size distribution suggested that precipitate growth was subject to interfacial rather than diffusional control.

AI.tldr: 研究通过STEM和SAXS/WAXS分析Mg-1.35wt.%Mn合金在室温高压扭转过程中析出相尺寸演化，发现α-Mn纳米颗粒体积分数随应变增加，但大部分锰仍保持固溶状态，析出反应受Mn扩散限制，平均粒径未增长表明生长受界面控制而非扩散控制。
AI.motivation: 研究Mg-Mn合金在室温高压扭转过程中析出相尺寸的演化规律，特别是了解在剧烈塑性变形条件下析出相的形成机制和生长控制因素，这对于理解纳米结构材料的相变动力学具有重要意义。
AI.method: 采用扫描透射电子显微镜（STEM）和小角/广角X射线散射（SAXS/WAXS）技术，对Mg-1.35wt.%Mn合金在室温高压扭转过程中的析出相进行表征，分析析出相尺寸分布和体积分数变化。
AI.result: α-Mn纳米颗粒的体积分数随应变增加而增加，但即使经过10圈HPT处理后，大部分锰仍保持固溶状态；析出相的平均粒径在整个HPT过程中未发生增长；析出相尺寸分布特征表明生长过程受界面控制而非扩散控制。
AI.conclusion: 在室温高压扭转条件下，Mg-Mn合金中析出反应仍受Mn扩散限制，但析出相的生长机制为界面控制而非扩散控制，这为理解剧烈塑性变形过程中的相变动力学提供了新见解。

title: Transport characteristics in Hermitian and non-Hermitian Fibonacci rings: A comparative study
summary: We present an extensive theoretical analysis of transport and circular currents and the associated induced magnetic fields in Fibonacci rings, explored in both Hermitian and non-Hermitian descriptions, with particular attention to configurations preserving or breaking PT symmetry. By engineering physically balanced gain and loss following a Fibonacci sequence, we realize two distinct geometrical configurations in which the ring either preserve or explicitly break PT symmetry, and further explore complementary realizations obtained by reversing the signs of the on site potentials. Using the non equilibrium Green's function (NEGF) formalism, we analyze transmission properties and bond current densities to quantify both transport and circulating currents. A comparison with the Hermitian limit establishes a clear baseline, where the ring supports only weak responses upon introducing disorder. In sharp contrast, non-Hermiticity leads to a pronounced amplification of transport and circular currents, and hence of the induced magnetic field. We further demonstrate that non-Hermitian transport is highly sensitive to gain and loss sign reversal and, in the non-PT-symmetric case, exhibits an unconventional dependence on system size governed by the parity of the Fibonacci sequence and hopping correlations. Remarkably, the current does not decay monotonically with increasing system size, revealing a distinct scaling behavior absent in conventional Hermitian systems. Our results highlight non-Hermitian quasiperiodic rings as versatile platforms for engineering and amplifying current driven magnetic responses through symmetry, topology, and gain-loss design.

AI.tldr: 该论文理论分析了斐波那契环中的输运和环流及其诱导磁场，比较了厄米和非厄米描述，特别关注PT对称性保持或破坏的构型，发现非厄米性显著放大电流和磁场响应。
AI.motivation: 研究斐波那契环中输运和环流现象，探索非厄米系统中通过增益-损耗工程和对称性设计来增强电流驱动磁响应的可能性，为工程化磁响应提供新平台。
AI.method: 使用非平衡格林函数(NEGF)形式分析传输特性和键电流密度，通过设计遵循斐波那契序列的物理平衡增益和损耗，实现PT对称性保持和破坏两种几何构型，并与厄米极限进行比较。
AI.result: 非厄米性导致输运和环流显著放大，从而增强诱导磁场；非厄米输运对增益和损耗符号反转高度敏感；在非PT对称情况下，系统尺寸依赖受斐波那契序列奇偶性和跳跃关联控制，电流不随系统尺寸单调衰减。
AI.conclusion: 非厄米准周期环是通过对称性、拓扑和增益-损耗设计来工程化和放大电流驱动磁响应的多功能平台，展现出与常规厄米系统不同的独特标度行为。

title: NiTi Single Crystal Growth by Micro-Pulling-Down Method: Experimental Setup and Material Characterization
summary: Nickel-titanium that has an austenite to martensite phase transition has been studied extensively in the past as a shape memory alloy, but a lot remains to be learned from such phase transitions. However, single crystals are needed for a detailed characterization of the emerging phase transition. In order to produce NiTi single crystals for research purposes, we have set up a micro-pulling-down ($μ$PD) apparatus. The $μ$PD process is a fast and flexible method for the fabrication of small single crystals. The apparatus is operated in vacuum. By pulling the crystal down through a hole in the crucible bottom, it is possible to reduce oxygen contamination, since oxides float on top of the melt due to their low density. Here we present a detailed characterization of as-grown NiTi crystals by electron backscatter diffraction (EBSD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDX), X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS), hot gas extraction method and differential scanning calorimetry (DSC). The characteristics of the phase transition in NiTi are very sensitive to dopants and alloying. The $μ$PD method facilitates the introduction of different doping elements into the crystal.

AI.tldr: 使用微下拉法（μPD）制备NiTi单晶，并通过多种表征技术分析其相变特性
AI.motivation: 镍钛合金的奥氏体-马氏体相变虽被广泛研究，但需要单晶进行详细表征。传统方法难以制备高质量单晶，且氧污染问题严重。
AI.method: 建立真空微下拉法（μPD）装置制备NiTi单晶，通过晶体从坩埚底部孔洞下拉减少氧污染。使用EBSD、SEM、EDX、XPS、热气体萃取法和DSC等多种技术表征晶体。
AI.result: 成功制备NiTi单晶，μPD方法能有效减少氧污染（氧化物因密度低浮在熔体表面），便于引入不同掺杂元素研究相变特性。
AI.conclusion: μPD是制备NiTi单晶的有效方法，为研究掺杂对相变敏感性的影响提供了灵活平台，有助于深入理解镍钛合金的相变机制。

title: Phonon-induced Markovian and non-Markovian effects on absorption spectra of moiré excitons in twisted transition metal dichalcogenide bilayers
summary: The properties of moiré excitons in twisted bilayers of transition metal dichalcogenides (TMDCs) vary significantly with the twist angle, ranging from quasi localized excitons with flat dispersions for small twist angles to delocalized excitons for larger ones. This twist angle dependence directly impacts the exciton-phonon coupling, which plays a significant role for the optical properties of these materials. In this work we theoretically investigate the twist angle dependent influence of phonons on absorption spectra of intralayer moiré excitons in a twisted TMDC hetero-bilayer. For the lowest-lying intralayer moiré exciton we find that the exciton-phonon coupling interpolates between two physically distinct regimes when tuning the twist angle. At small twist angles non-Markovian polarization dynamics and phonon sidebands dominate the properties of absorption spectra for localized excitons. For larger twist angles Markovian processes become more important leading to additional line broadening. Furthermore, the absorption spectra here show a characteristic asymmetric peak similar to monolayer TMDCs. When taking into account multiple bright moiré exciton bands we find that intraband scattering due to optical phonons has a significant impact on absorption spectra, effectively suppressing absorption peaks of higher lying bands when their bandwidth surpasses the optical phonon energy.

AI.tldr: 该理论研究揭示了扭曲双层过渡金属硫族化合物中莫尔激子-声子耦合随扭曲角度的变化规律，发现从小角度到较大角度存在两种不同的物理机制，影响吸收光谱特性。
AI.motivation: 莫尔激子在扭曲双层TMDCs中的性质随扭曲角度变化显著，从准局域化到离域化，这种变化直接影响激子-声子耦合，进而影响材料的光学性质，需要系统研究扭曲角度对吸收光谱的影响机制。
AI.method: 通过理论方法研究扭曲TMDC异质双层中莫尔激子的吸收光谱，分析不同扭曲角度下激子-声子耦合的物理机制，考虑最低能级莫尔激子和多个亮莫尔激子带的情况。
AI.result: 发现激子-声子耦合随扭曲角度在两种物理机制间过渡：小角度时非马尔可夫极化动力学和声子边带主导局域激子的吸收光谱；较大角度时马尔可夫过程更重要，导致额外的谱线展宽，吸收峰呈现类似单层TMDC的不对称特征。考虑多个亮莫尔激子带时，光学声子引起的带内散射显著影响吸收光谱，当带宽超过光学声子能量时会抑制高能带的吸收峰。
AI.conclusion: 扭曲角度是调控TMDC莫尔激子-声子耦合和光学性质的关键参数，通过改变扭曲角度可以实现从局域化到离域化激子行为的连续调控，为设计基于莫尔激子的光电器件提供了理论基础。

title: Exact Theory of Fermi-Energy Response at Metallic Interfaces
summary: The response of the Fermi energy to external perturbations governs key physical observables at metallic interfaces. Although this response admits a local formulation in terms of the Fukui function, its evaluation has traditionally been limited by inherent approximations, fundamentally rooted in the difficulty of adding a finite charge in a periodic system. We present an exact resolution to this problem that leverages the screening properties of electronic conductors to compute Fukui functions via a finite electric field. The resulting linear-response theory yields strictly quadratic error scaling of Fermi-level shifts across representative platinum surfaces, achieving sub-meV accuracy up to fields of 0.1 V/Å. The approach is further validated by reproducing work-function changes under molecular perturbations, and by providing mean-field estimates of electrode potentials that yield capacitance--voltage curves consistent with experiment. Our findings establish a rigorous foundation for a local theory relating electrostatic screening and Fermi-energy variations at metallic interfaces.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种精确计算金属界面Fukui函数的新方法，通过有限电场利用电子导体的屏蔽特性，实现了费米能级位移的二次误差缩放，达到亚meV精度。
AI.motivation: 金属界面费米能级对外部扰动的响应是理解界面物理性质的关键，传统方法受限于周期性系统中添加有限电荷的困难，存在固有近似。
AI.method: 利用电子导体的屏蔽特性，通过有限电场计算Fukui函数，建立线性响应理论，实现费米能级位移的精确计算。
AI.result: 在代表性铂表面上实现了费米能级位移的严格二次误差缩放，在0.1 V/Å电场下达到亚meV精度；成功再现分子扰动下的功函数变化，得到与实验一致的电容-电压曲线。
AI.conclusion: 为金属界面静电屏蔽与费米能级变化的局域理论建立了严格基础，解决了传统方法中的固有近似问题。

title: Nonlinear mode interactions under parametric excitation in a YIG microdisk
summary: A pair of quantized spin-wave modes is driven by two-tone parallel pumping in a YIG microdisk. The nonlinear dynamics is experimentally investigated by probing the resulting steady state, which is found to critically depend on the chosen pair of modes, the detuning between the pump frequencies and the modes parametric resonance, as well as the temporal sequence of the two rf tones. A general theory of parametric excitation in confined structures based on magnetization normal modes is developed and quantitatively accounts for the observed dependence and non-commutative behaviors, which emerge from the interplay between the self and mutual nonlinear frequency shifts of the spin-wave modes. Owing to its high degree of external controllability and scalability to larger sets of modes, this dynamical system provides a model platform for exploring nonlinear phenomena and a promising route toward rf driven state mapping relevant to neuromorphic and unconventional computing.

AI.tldr: 实验研究了YIG微盘中双音平行泵浦驱动的量子化自旋波模式对，发现其稳态非线性动力学特性取决于模式选择、泵浦频率失谐及时间序列，理论模型解释了这些非对易行为源于自旋波模式的自洽与互非线性频移相互作用。
AI.motivation: 研究受限结构中自旋波模式对的非线性动力学，探索其在射频驱动状态映射、神经形态计算和非传统计算中的应用潜力，为非线性现象研究提供可控模型平台。
AI.method: 采用双音平行泵浦技术驱动YIG微盘中的量子化自旋波模式对，实验探测稳态响应，并基于磁化强度正则模式理论建立参数激发通用理论模型。
AI.result: 实验发现稳态非线性动力学特性强烈依赖于：1）选择的模式对；2）泵浦频率与模式参数共振的失谐；3）两个射频音调的时间序列。理论模型定量解释了观测到的依赖性和非对易行为。
AI.conclusion: 该系统具有高度外部可控性和可扩展性，为探索非线性现象提供了模型平台，并为射频驱动状态映射在神经形态和非传统计算中的应用提供了有前景的途径。

title: First-principles analysis of in-plane anomalous Hall effect using symmetry-adapted Wannier Hamiltonians and multipole decomposition
summary: The in-plane anomalous Hall effect occurs when magnetization lies within the same plane as the electric field and Hall current, and requires magnetic point groups lacking rotational or mirror symmetries. While it is observed in both Weyl semimetals and elemental ferromagnets, the microscopic role of higher-order multipoles remains unclear. Here, we develop a microscopic framework that combines time-reversal-symmetric Wannier functions with a symmetry-adapted multipole basis to decompose the first-principles Wannier Hamiltonian into electric, magnetic, magnetic toroidal, and electric toroidal multipoles. This approach allows us to rotate the magnetization rank by rank and quantify how each multipole affects the conductivity. Applying this framework to body-centered cubic iron, we find that high-rank magnetic and magnetic toroidal multipoles contribute with magnitudes comparable to magnetic dipoles, while magnetic toroidal 16-poles act with the opposite sign. Furthermore, based on this multipole analysis, we apply uniaxial strain along the [103] direction to control the dominant multipoles contributing to the conductivity. The strain substantially modifies its angular dependence, demonstrating that multipole-resolved Hamiltonian engineering and magnetoelastic control serve as practical routes to predict and tune the in-plane anomalous Hall conductivity in simple ferromagnets.

AI.tldr: 该研究开发了一种微观框架，结合时间反演对称的Wannier函数和对称适应的多极基，将第一性原理Wannier哈密顿量分解为电、磁、磁环和电环多极子，用于分析面内反常霍尔效应中高阶多极子的作用。
AI.motivation: 面内反常霍尔效应需要缺乏旋转或镜像对称性的磁点群，在Weyl半金属和元素铁磁体中都有观察到，但高阶多极子的微观作用尚不清楚。
AI.method: 开发微观框架，结合时间反演对称的Wannier函数和对称适应的多极基，将第一性原理Wannier哈密顿量分解为电、磁、磁环和电环多极子，逐级旋转磁化并量化每个多极子对电导率的影响。
AI.result: 在体心立方铁中，发现高阶磁和磁环多极子的贡献与磁偶极子相当，而磁环16极子作用符号相反。基于多极子分析，沿[103]方向施加单轴应变可控制主导多极子，显著改变电导率的角依赖性。
AI.conclusion: 多极子分辨的哈密顿量工程和磁弹性控制是预测和调控简单铁磁体中面内反常霍尔电导率的实用途径。

title: Gate-tunable charge-spin interconversion in graphene/heavy-metal heterostructures
summary: Spintronics has emerged as a promising field for next-generation devices, offering functionalities beyond complementary metal-oxide-semiconductor (CMOS). A critical challenge in spintronics is to develop systems that can efficiently generate spin currents and enable their long-distance transport. Here, we demonstrate a graphene (Gr)/heavy metal (HM) heterostructure system that combines strong charge-spin interconversion efficiency, induced by the spin Hall effect, with a long spin diffusion length. By employing an industry-friendly magnetron sputtering technique, we deposit HM layers onto few-layer Gr while minimizing structural damage. The proximity effect from the HM enhances the spin Hall angle of Gr while limiting the reduction in its spin diffusion length. Additionally, the spin Hall angle can be tuned via an applied gate voltage, offering high controllability of the system. Importantly, these properties are observed across heterostructures composed of different HMs, indicating the generality of this approach. Our findings establish Gr/HM heterostructures as a scalable and versatile platform for spin current generation, paving the way for advanced spintronic devices with high efficiency, long spin propagation, and straightforward fabrication processes.

AI.tldr: 石墨烯/重金属异质结构结合了强电荷-自旋转换效率和长自旋扩散长度，为高效自旋电流生成和长距离传输提供了可扩展平台。
AI.motivation: 自旋电子学需要开发能够高效生成自旋电流并实现长距离传输的系统，以超越传统CMOS技术的功能限制。
AI.method: 采用工业友好的磁控溅射技术在少层石墨烯上沉积重金属层，通过邻近效应增强自旋霍尔角，同时保持长自旋扩散长度，并通过栅压调控自旋霍尔角。
AI.result: 石墨烯/重金属异质结构展现出强电荷-自旋转换效率、长自旋扩散长度和栅压可调性，这些特性在不同重金属组成的异质结构中普遍存在。
AI.conclusion: 石墨烯/重金属异质结构为高效、长距离自旋传播且易于制造的自旋电子器件提供了可扩展和通用的平台。

title: Mechanical control of magnetic exchange and response in GdRu$_2$Si$_2$: A computational study
summary: We present a systematic computational study of the effect of uniaxial strain on the magnetic properties of GdRu$_2$Si$_2$, a centrosymmetric material known to host a field-induced skyrmion lattice (SkL). Using first-principles density functional theory, we first demonstrate the pronounced sensitivity of the exchange and anisotropy to specific structural distortions. These DFT-derived interactions are then integrated into a classical spin model to construct comprehensive magnetic phase diagrams under both compressive and tensile strain. Our key finding is that compressive strain ($\sim 2\%$) acts as an effective tuning parameter, substantially expanding the stability region of the $\vec Q_{100}$-driven topologically nontrivial phases. This results from the shifts in the critical magnetic fields and enhancement of the energy scale of the favored magnetic wave vector. In contrast, tensile strain induces a different magnetic ground-state by promoting a different magnetic ordering vector, $\vec Q_{110}$, leading to entirely distinct phase behavior. This work not only provides a quantitative understanding of the structural-magnetic coupling in GdRu$_2$Si$_2$ but also establishes strain engineering as a powerful approach to control and optimize topologically non-trivial magnetic phases in centrosymmetric magnets.

AI.tldr: 通过第一性原理计算和经典自旋模型，研究发现压缩应变可显著扩大GdRu₂Si₂中拓扑非平凡磁相（如斯格明子晶格）的稳定区域，而拉伸应变则诱导不同的磁基态。
AI.motivation: 研究GdRu₂Si₂这种中心对称材料中单轴应变对磁性的影响，特别是如何通过应变工程调控拓扑非平凡磁相（如场诱导斯格明子晶格）。
AI.method: 采用第一性原理密度泛函理论计算交换相互作用和各向异性，然后将DFT得到的相互作用参数整合到经典自旋模型中，构建压缩和拉伸应变下的全面磁相图。
AI.result: 压缩应变（约2%）作为有效调控参数，显著扩大了由Q₁₀₀驱动的拓扑非平凡磁相的稳定区域，这是通过临界磁场的移动和有利磁波矢能量尺度的增强实现的。拉伸应变则通过促进不同的磁序向量Q₁₁₀诱导不同的磁基态，导致完全不同的相行为。
AI.conclusion: 该工作不仅定量理解了GdRu₂Si₂中的结构-磁性耦合，还确立了应变工程作为控制和优化中心对称磁体中拓扑非平凡磁相的有力方法。

title: High-Energy Interlayer Exciton Ensembles in MoSe$_2$/WSe$_2$ Heterostructures by Laguerre-Gaussian Excitation
summary: We reveal the higher energetic luminescence part of interlayer exciton ensembles in MoSe$_2$/WSe$_2$ heterostructures upon excitation by an optical Laguerre-Gaussian mode. The excitation is achieved with the help of a spatial light modulator giving rise to a ring-shaped distribution of interlayer excitons. A hyperspectral analysis of the exciton photoluminescence suggests that the excitation scheme allows the accumulation of high-energetic excitons in the rings' center. We discuss the mechanisms leading to such a distribution, including exciton-exciton interaction, phase-space filling, and an incomplete thermalization.

AI.tldr: 利用拉盖尔-高斯光束激发MoSe2/WSe2异质结中的层间激子，通过空间光调制器形成环形激子分布，高能激子在环中心聚集
AI.motivation: 研究光学拉盖尔-高斯模式激发下MoSe2/WSe2异质结中层间激子集合的高能发光部分，探索特殊激发方式对激子分布的影响
AI.method: 使用空间光调制器产生光学拉盖尔-高斯模式激发MoSe2/WSe2异质结，形成环形激子分布，通过高光谱分析研究激子光致发光
AI.result: 激发方案使高能激子在环形分布的中心区域聚集，观察到激子-激子相互作用、相空间填充和不完全热化等机制
AI.conclusion: 拉盖尔-高斯激发模式能够调控层间激子的空间分布和能量分布，为激子工程和光电子应用提供了新途径

title: Unraveling the effects of anionic vacancies and temperature on mechanical properties of NbC and NbN: Insights from Quantum Mechanical Study
summary: Transition metal carbides and nitrides (TMCNs), such as niobium carbide (NbC) and niobium nitride (NbN), are of great technological interest due to their exceptional hardness, high melting points, and thermal stability. While previous studies have focused on their groundstate properties (at 0 K), limited information exists on their mechanical behavior under realistic operational conditions involving elevated temperatures and the presence of defects. In this study, we employ ab initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) simulations to investigate the effects of temperature (300 to 1500 K) and anionic vacancies on the mechanical properties of NbC and NbN in rocksalt (RS), zincblende (ZB), and wurtzite (WZ) structures. The results reveal a nonlinear decrease in elastic constants, bulk, shear, and Youngs moduli with both increasing temperature and defect concentration. Hardness and toughness analyses, based on Pughs ratio and Poisson ratio, show ductility and brittleness transitions that are sensitive to structure, defect level, and thermal effects. Furthermore, vacancy migration energies computed using the nudged elastic band (NEB) method demonstrate strong structural dependence, with RS exhibiting the highest barriers and WZ the lowest. These findings provide new insights into the defect and temperature interplay in NbC and NbN, offering guidelines for their optimization in high-temperature and wear-resistant applications.

AI.tldr: 通过AIMD模拟研究温度和空位缺陷对NbC/NbN机械性能的影响，发现弹性常数随温度和缺陷浓度非线性下降，延脆性转变受结构、缺陷和温度共同影响。
AI.motivation: 过渡金属碳氮化物具有优异的硬度和热稳定性，但现有研究主要关注0K基态性质，缺乏对实际高温和缺陷条件下机械行为的理解。
AI.method: 采用从头算分子动力学模拟，研究300-1500K温度和阴离子空位对NbC/NbN三种结构（岩盐、闪锌矿、纤锌矿）机械性能的影响，并使用NEB方法计算空位迁移能。
AI.result: 弹性常数、体积模量、剪切模量和杨氏模量随温度和缺陷浓度非线性下降；延脆性转变对结构、缺陷水平和热效应敏感；空位迁移能呈现强结构依赖性，岩盐结构最高，纤锌矿最低。
AI.conclusion: 研究揭示了NbC/NbN中缺陷与温度的相互作用机制，为优化其在高温和耐磨应用中的性能提供了指导。

title: Evolution of the Berry curvature dipole in uniaxially strained bilayer graphene
summary: While in pristine bilayer graphene the Berry curvature dipole (BCD), a necessary ingredient for the nonlinear anomalous Hall effect, is zero, uniaxial strain can give rise to finite BCD. We investigate this by using a tight-binding (TB) approach build on the Slater-Koster parameterization to capture lattice deformation effects often missed by continuum models. We demonstrate that the BCD's evolution with strain and doping is highly sensitive to the choice in parameterization, particularly when including the longer range interlayer skew hoppings. Additionally, out-of-plane compression enhances the response by broadening the Dirac cones. These findings benchmark low-energy continuum models and highlight the necessity of realistic tight-binding models for accurately predicting strain-engineered Hall effects in bilayer graphene.

AI.tldr: 双层石墨烯中，本征态贝里曲率偶极子为零，但单轴应变可产生有限贝里曲率偶极子，从而引发非线性反常霍尔效应。研究使用基于Slater-Koster参数化的紧束缚方法，发现贝里曲率偶极子对应变和掺杂的演化高度依赖于参数化选择，特别是包含长程层间斜跃迁时。面外压缩通过展宽狄拉克锥增强响应。
AI.motivation: 研究双层石墨烯中应变如何产生贝里曲率偶极子，从而引发非线性反常霍尔效应。虽然本征双层石墨烯的贝里曲率偶极子为零，但应变可以打破对称性产生有限值，这对于应变工程化的霍尔效应应用具有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用基于Slater-Koster参数化的紧束缚方法，该方法能捕捉晶格变形效应，而连续模型常忽略这些效应。特别关注了长程层间斜跃迁参数的影响。
AI.result: 贝里曲率偶极子对应变和掺杂的演化高度依赖于参数化选择，特别是包含长程层间斜跃迁时。面外压缩通过展宽狄拉克锥增强了响应。这些结果为低能连续模型提供了基准，并强调了使用现实紧束缚模型准确预测应变工程化霍尔效应的必要性。
AI.conclusion: 应变工程化的双层石墨烯中的非线性反常霍尔效应需要采用现实的紧束缚模型进行准确预测，因为参数化选择（特别是长程层间斜跃迁）对贝里曲率偶极子的演化有显著影响。面外压缩可增强效应，为实验设计提供了指导。

title: Observation of magnon torques mediated by orbital hybridization at the light metal/antiferromagnetic insulator interface
summary: Magnon torques, which can operate without involving moving electrons, could circumvent the Joule heating issue. In conventional magnon torque systems, the spin source layer with strong spin-orbit coupling is utilized to inject magnons, and the efficiency is limited by the inherent spin Hall conductivity of the spin source layer. In this work, we observe magnon torques in the Cr/NiO/ferromagnet heterostructure with the effective spin Hall conductivity of 2.45x10^5 hbar/(2eΩm), twice that of the best conventional magnon torque system. We demonstrate the magnon-torque-driven switching of a perpendicularly magnetized CoFeB layer at room temperature, with a switching power consumption density of 0.136 mW/μm^2. We find that the magnon torque originates from the orbital hybridization and interfacial inversion symmetry breaking at the Cr/NiO interface. Our findings not only significantly enhance the efficiency of magnon torques, but also provide key insights into the fundamental mechanisms of magnon injections.

AI.motivation: 传统磁子扭矩系统依赖强自旋轨道耦合的自旋源层注入磁子，效率受限于自旋霍尔电导率。为克服焦耳热问题并提高磁子扭矩效率，需要开发新型高效磁子注入机制。
AI.method: 采用Cr/NiO/铁磁体异质结构，通过Cr/NiO界面的轨道杂化和界面反演对称性破缺产生磁子扭矩。测量有效自旋霍尔电导率，并演示室温下垂直磁化CoFeB层的磁子扭矩驱动翻转。

title: Mode-Selective Cloaking and Ghost Quantum Wells in Bilayer Graphene Transport
comment: 7 pages, 3 figures excluding appendixes. Comments are very welcome
summary: We study ballistic electron transport through electrostatic barriers in AB-stacked bilayer graphene within a full four-band framework. A mode-resolved analysis reveals how propagating and evanescent channels couple across electrostatic interfaces and how channel selectivity governs transport at normal incidence. We show that, even when decoupled channels remain inactive, perfect transmission can occur at discrete energies due to phase matching of a single internal mode within an individual barrier. This effect is interpreted as a ghost quantum well, namely an effective cavity formed by internal phase coherence inside the barrier, without true bound states and without restoring coupling to decoupled channels. For single- and double-barrier geometries, we derive compact analytical expressions for the transmission and identify the corresponding resonance conditions. Extending the analysis to multibarrier structures using a transfer-matrix approach, we demonstrate how perfect resonances driven by internal phase matching coexist with Fabry-Perot-like resonances arising from inter-barrier interference. Our results provide a unified, channel-resolved description of tunnelling suppression and resonance-assisted transport in bilayer graphene barrier systems.

AI.tldr: 双层石墨烯静电势垒中电子输运的四能带理论分析，揭示了内部相位匹配导致的"幽灵量子阱"效应和完美共振传输

title: Spin dynamics of excitons and carriers in mixed-cation MA$_{x}$FA$_{1-x}$PbI$_{3}$ perovskite crystals: alloy fluctuations probed by optical orientation
summary: Optical spin orientation measured by time-resolved photoluminescence provides a powerful tool to probe the spin dynamics of excitons and charge carriers in perovskite semiconductors. The impact of alloy fluctuations on the spin dynamics of mixed-cation \MAFAPI{} perovskite single crystals is studied here experimentally. The optical orientation is measured under nonresonant excitation for crystals with $x = 0.1$, $0.4$, and $0.8$ at cryogenic temperatures and compared with data on \MAPI{} crystals. The high degree of exciton optical orientation of $75-80$\% for $x = 0.1$ and $0.8$ reduces to about 60\% for $x = 0.4$. A similar trend is observed for the carrier spin optical orientation. This behavior is attributed to enhanced scattering of free excitons and carriers in the alloys with increased compositional and structural disorder. From the Larmor spin precession measured from spin dynamics in an external magnetic field applied in the Voigt geometry, the electron and hole $g$-factors are evaluated. Their dependence on the band gap energy in \MAFAPI{} crystals follows the universal trend previously established for lead halide perovskites.

AI.tldr: 研究MAFAPI钙钛矿单晶中合金波动对激子和载流子自旋动力学的影响，发现中等组分(x=0.4)的自旋光学取向度降低，归因于合金无序增强的散射效应。
AI.motivation: 研究混合阳离子MAFAPI钙钛矿中合金成分波动对激子和载流子自旋动力学的影响，理解结构无序对自旋特性的调控机制。
AI.method: 采用时间分辨光致发光测量光学自旋取向，在低温下对x=0.1、0.4、0.8的MAFAPI单晶进行非共振激发实验，并与MAPI晶体对比。通过Voigt几何下的拉莫尔自旋进动测量电子和空穴g因子。
AI.result: x=0.1和0.8的晶体激子光学取向度达75-80%，而x=0.4降至约60%；载流子自旋取向呈现相似趋势。电子和空穴g因子随带隙能量的变化遵循铅卤钙钛矿的普遍规律。

title: Structural and magnetic properties of co-sputtered epitaxial Fe-Sn kagome thin films
summary: In recent years the intermetallic alloys of Fe and Sn have gained significant interest due to a rich variety of magnetic properties present in these materials. The crystal Fe3Sn2 is a frustrated ferromagnet, while the crystallographically similar FeSn, which differs only by the stacking sequence of its Fe-containining kagome and stanene layers, is an antiferromagnet. Thin-film growth techniques such as magnetron sputtering allow for these different stoichiometric compositions to be grown through adjustments of the rate of deposition of the individual Fe and Sn sources, while all other conditions remain constant. Here, we report the production of high quality epitaxial thin films of Fe$_3$Sn$_2$ and FeSn on sapphire with a Pt seed layer, as well as a mixed phase containing intergrowths of both crystals, all of which we have characterized using both X-ray and four-dimensional scanning transmission electron microscopy (4D-STEM) methods. The resulting crystallographic phase content is compared to the results of magnetization measurements, with correspondence between the predicted ferromagnetic phase content and the resulting magnetization. Further magnetic properties of these films can then also be compared, leading to the discovery of a unique behavior in the temperature dependent coercivity within highly mixed phase alloys, a feature that is absent in either pure Fe3Sn2 and FeSn.

AI.tldr: 该研究成功制备了Fe₃Sn₂和FeSn的高质量外延薄膜，并发现混合相合金具有独特的温度依赖性矫顽力行为。
AI.motivation: Fe-Sn金属间化合物因其丰富的磁性性质而备受关注，其中Fe₃Sn₂是受挫铁磁体，而FeSn是反铁磁体。通过磁控溅射技术可以调控不同化学计量比的薄膜生长，研究这些材料的磁性特性具有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用磁控溅射技术在蓝宝石衬底上制备Fe₃Sn₂和FeSn的高质量外延薄膜，通过调整Fe和Sn源的沉积速率控制化学计量比。采用X射线和四维扫描透射电子显微镜（4D-STEM）进行结构表征，并进行磁化测量分析磁性性质。
AI.result: 成功制备了纯Fe₃Sn₂、纯FeSn以及两者混合相的高质量外延薄膜。磁化测量结果与预测的铁磁相含量相符。在高度混合相合金中发现了独特的温度依赖性矫顽力行为，这一特征在纯Fe₃Sn₂和纯FeSn中均不存在。
AI.conclusion: 通过精确控制沉积条件可以制备不同化学计量比的Fe-Sn薄膜，混合相合金展现出独特的磁性行为，这为理解Fe-Sn体系的磁性性质提供了新见解，并展示了通过相工程调控材料性能的可能性。

title: Bio-resorbable magnetic tunnel junctions
summary: Magnetic tunnel junctions (MTJs) play a crucial role in spintronic applications, particularly data storage and sensors. Especially as a non-volatile memory, MTJs have received substantial attention due to its CMOS compatibility, low power consumption, fast switching speed, and high endurance. In parallel, bio-resorbable electronics have emerged as a promising solution for systems requiring temporary operation and secure data disposal, especially in military, intelligence, and biomedical systems where devices must safely disintegrate under physiological conditions. In this study, we investigate the bio-resorbability of MTJ by analyzing the dissolution behavior of its nanometer-thick constituent layers in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) solution at pH 7.4, simulating physiological environments. The MTJ structures, composed of bio-resorbable materials, exhibit well-controlled degradation behaviors. Critically, as one of the ferromagnetic layers dissolves, binary information is irreversibly lost, within 10 hours of immersion. These findings highlight the potential of MTJs not only as high-performance memory elements but also as secure, transient data storage platforms. The ability to modify the dissolution lifetime by materials and thickness selection offers unique advantages for short-lived implantable devices, paving the way for integrating spintronic functionality into next-generation bioresorbable electronics.

AI.tldr: 研究探索磁性隧道结(MTJ)的生物可吸收性，通过分析其在模拟生理环境中的溶解行为，发现MTJ可作为安全的瞬态数据存储平台。
AI.motivation: 磁性隧道结在自旋电子应用中至关重要，而生物可吸收电子学在军事、情报和生物医学系统中具有重要应用价值。本研究旨在探索MTJ的生物可吸收性，为集成自旋电子功能到下一代生物可吸收电子设备中铺平道路。
AI.method: 研究MTJ在磷酸盐缓冲盐水(PBS)溶液(pH 7.4)中的溶解行为，模拟生理环境。分析纳米级厚度的组成层的溶解特性，特别关注铁磁层的溶解过程。
AI.result: 由生物可吸收材料组成的MTJ结构展现出良好控制的降解行为。当其中一个铁磁层溶解时，二进制信息在10小时内不可逆地丢失。通过材料和厚度选择可以调节溶解寿命。
AI.conclusion: MTJ不仅可作为高性能存储元件，还可作为安全的瞬态数据存储平台。这种能力为短期植入式设备提供了独特优势，推动了自旋电子功能与生物可吸收电子学的集成。

title: Thermally Configurable Multi-Order Polar Skyrmions in Multiferroic Oxide Superlattices
summary: Polar topological textures in low-dimensional ferroelectrics have emerged as a versatile platform for high-density information storage and neuromorphic computing. While low-order topological states, such as vortices and skyrmions, have been extensively studied, high-order polar topological families remain largely unexplored due to their higher energy requirements and limited stabilization methods. Here, using a BiFeO3 (BFO)-based multiferroic superlattice as a model system, we demonstrate a thermal-modulation strategy that stabilizes multi-order polar skyrmions and enables reversible tuning of their topological order through phase-field simulations. It was found that temperature modulation drives the system from polar solitons through 1π-, 2π-, 3π-, and 4π-skyrmion states, with closed heating-cooling path analyses revealing the widest thermal stability window for 2π-skyrmions (up to 600 K). Leveraging this robustness, 2% Sm doping in BFO lowers the transition temperatures, enabling room-temperature stabilization of 2π-skyrmions. These findings enrich the fundamental understanding of multi-order polar topologies and establish a tunable strategy for realizing variable-order topological configurations in practical memory devices.

AI.tldr: 通过热调制策略在BiFeO3基多铁超晶格中稳定多阶极性斯格明子，实现拓扑阶数的可逆调控，并通过Sm掺杂实现室温稳定
AI.motivation: 低维铁电体中的极性拓扑结构为高密度信息存储和神经形态计算提供了平台，但高阶极性拓扑家族由于能量要求高和稳定方法有限而未被充分探索
AI.method: 使用BiFeO3基多铁超晶格作为模型系统，通过相场模拟演示热调制策略，稳定多阶极性斯格明子并实现拓扑阶数的可逆调控
AI.result: 温度调制驱动系统从极性孤子到1π-、2π-、3π-和4π-斯格明子态，2π-斯格明子具有最宽的热稳定窗口（高达600K），通过2% Sm掺杂BFO降低转变温度，实现室温稳定
AI.conclusion: 这些发现丰富了多阶极性拓扑的基本理解，并为实际存储器件中实现可变阶拓扑配置建立了可调谐策略

title: Crystalline-dependent magnon torques in all-sputtered Hf/Cr2O3/ferromagnet heterostructures
summary: Electron motion in spin-orbit torque devices inevitably leads to the Joule heating issue. Magnon torques can potentially circumvent this issue, as it enables the transport of spin angular momentum in insulating magnetic materials. In this work, we fabricate a sandwich structure composed of Hf/antiferromagnetic Cr2O3/ferromagnet and demonstrate that the magnon torque is strongly dependent on the crystalline structure of Cr2O3. Magnon torques are stronger when the Neel vector of Cr2O3 aligns parallel to the spin polarization generated in Hf, while they are suppressed when the Neel vector is perpendicular to the spin polarization. The magnon torque efficiency is estimated to be -0.134 using in-plane second harmonic Hall measurements. Using magnon torques, we achieve perpendicular magnetization switching of CoFeB, with a critical switching current density of 4.09 x 10^7 A/cm^2. Furthermore, the spin angular momentum loss due to the insertion of Cr2O3 is found to be lower than that of polycrystalline NiO. Our work highlights the role of antiferromagnet crystalline structures in controlling magnon torques, broadening the potential applications of magnon torques.

AI.tldr: 该研究展示了反铁磁Cr2O3的晶体结构对磁子扭矩的调控作用，实现了低功耗的垂直磁化翻转
AI.motivation: 传统自旋轨道扭矩器件中的电子运动会产生焦耳热问题，而磁子扭矩可以在绝缘磁性材料中传输自旋角动量，从而避免这一问题
AI.method: 制备Hf/反铁磁Cr2O3/铁磁体三明治结构，通过面内二次谐波霍尔测量研究磁子扭矩，分析Cr2O3晶体结构对磁子扭矩的影响
AI.result: 磁子扭矩效率估计为-0.134，实现了CoFeB的垂直磁化翻转，临界翻转电流密度为4.09×10^7 A/cm²，Cr2O3的自旋角动量损失低于多晶NiO
AI.conclusion: 反铁磁体晶体结构在调控磁子扭矩中起关键作用，这拓宽了磁子扭矩的潜在应用前景

title: Noncollinear spin structure in Dy-doped classical ferrimagnet
summary: Noncollinear spin structures have attracted tremendous attention because they offer a versatile platform for spin control and manipulation, essential in spintronics. Realizing noncollinearity in ferrimagnetic insulators is of particular interest as they can be potentially utilized in low-damping spintronics with tunable magnetic order. Within the spinel-ferrite family, Zn and Al-substituted nickel ferrite (NiZAF) has emerged as an excellent choice for low-damping spintronics. However, realizing noncollinearity in such systems remains challenging. Here, we present evidence of noncollinear spin structure in the NiZAF thin films induced by the rare earth Dy-doping, utilizing the soft x-ray spectroscopy methods such as magnetic circular dichroism and x-ray resonant magnetic reflectivity (XRMR). In particular, XRMR reveals a spiral-type spin structure, which is attributed to the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction, arising due to broken inversion symmetry by the Dy-induced local strain field as confirmed by our theoretical calculations. The realization of noncollinearity in the spinel-ferrite opens pathway to explore the possibility of chiral magnetic domains and topological spin textures exhibiting promise for oxide-based spintronics

AI.motivation: 非共线自旋结构在自旋电子学中具有重要应用价值，特别是在铁磁绝缘体中实现非共线性对于低阻尼自旋电子学至关重要。尖晶石铁氧体家族中的NiZAF是低阻尼自旋电子学的优秀选择，但在这些系统中实现非共线性仍然具有挑战性。
AI.method: 采用软X射线光谱方法，包括磁圆二色性和X射线共振磁反射(XRMR)，研究Dy掺杂的NiZAF薄膜。通过理论计算确认Dy诱导的局部应变场破坏反演对称性。
AI.result: XRMR揭示了螺旋型自旋结构，这归因于Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya相互作用。理论计算证实Dy诱导的局部应变场破坏了反演对称性，从而产生了这种相互作用。
AI.conclusion: 在尖晶石铁氧体中实现非共线性为探索手性磁畴和拓扑自旋纹理开辟了途径，展示了氧化物基自旋电子学的应用前景。

title: On the Feasibility of Extreme Heating Rates in SEM using MEMS Heater Platforms
summary: Understanding microstructural evolution under extreme thermal conditions is essential for advancing metal additive manufacturing (AM). This work demonstrates the feasibility of employing micro-electro-mechanical system (MEMS) heating platforms for in-situ scanning electron microscopy (SEM) characterization of bulk-like samples during rapid thermal cycling. Using electron backscatter diffraction (EBSD), we tracked the ferrite-to-austenite phase transformation in a pure iron specimen and confirmed that the sample surface temperature closely follows the MEMS temperature setpoint within device accuracy. Under vacuum conditions, stable heating and cooling rates of up to 1000 C/s were achieved with minimal power input and without compromising EBSD pattern quality. These findings establish MEMS-based heating as a robust approach for in-situ microstructural characterization of AM-relevant thermal processes in the SEM, enabling quantitative studies of thermally activated phenomena such as diffusion, phase transformations, and microstructural evolution under far-from-equilibrium conditions.

AI.tldr: 该研究开发了基于MEMS加热平台的SEM原位表征技术，用于研究金属增材制造中的极端热循环过程，实现了高达1000°C/s的快速加热/冷却速率，并成功追踪了纯铁中的相变过程。
AI.motivation: 理解极端热条件下的微观结构演变对于推进金属增材制造至关重要。需要开发能够模拟AM过程中快速热循环的原位表征方法。
AI.method: 采用微机电系统（MEMS）加热平台结合扫描电子显微镜（SEM）进行原位表征，利用电子背散射衍射（EBSD）技术追踪纯铁样品在快速热循环过程中的铁素体-奥氏体相变。
AI.result: 在真空条件下实现了高达1000°C/s的稳定加热和冷却速率，样品表面温度与MEMS设定温度高度一致，且EBSD图案质量不受影响，成功追踪了相变过程。
AI.conclusion: MEMS基加热为SEM中的原位微观结构表征提供了稳健方法，能够定量研究远离平衡条件下的热激活现象，如扩散、相变和微观结构演变，对AM相关热过程研究具有重要意义。

title: First-principles study of hydrogen diffusion in polycrystalline Nickel
summary: Hydrogen embrittlement in metals is strongly governed by hydrogen diffusion and trapping, yet predicting these effects in polycrystalline systems remains challenging. This work introduces a multiscale modeling framework that links atomistic energetics to continuum-scale transport. Migration barriers for bulk and grain-boundary environments, obtained from first-principles calculations, are used in kinetic Monte Carlo simulations to compute anisotropic effective diffusivities. These diffusivities are then incorporated into finite element models of polycrystalline microstructures, explicitly accounting for grain-boundary character and connectivity. The approach captures both fast-path and trapping effects without relying on empirical parameters and reproduces experimental trends for nickel, including the dependence of effective diffusivity on grain size and boundary type. This methodology provides a physically grounded route for predicting hydrogen transport in engineering alloys and can be extended to other materials and defect types.

AI.tldr: 提出多尺度建模框架，将原子尺度能量学与连续介质尺度输运相连接，用于预测多晶金属中的氢扩散和捕获效应，无需经验参数。
AI.motivation: 氢在金属中的脆化效应受氢扩散和捕获的强烈影响，但在多晶系统中预测这些效应仍然具有挑战性。现有方法缺乏物理基础，依赖经验参数。
AI.method: 开发多尺度建模框架：1) 通过第一性原理计算获得体相和晶界环境的迁移势垒；2) 使用动力学蒙特卡洛模拟计算各向异性有效扩散系数；3) 将这些扩散系数纳入多晶微观结构的有限元模型，明确考虑晶界特征和连通性。
AI.result: 该方法能够捕获快速路径和捕获效应，无需经验参数，成功再现了镍的实验趋势，包括有效扩散系数对晶粒尺寸和晶界类型的依赖性。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为预测工程合金中的氢输运提供了物理基础的方法，并可扩展到其他材料和缺陷类型，有助于理解氢脆机制。

title: A Critical Examination of Active Learning Workflows in Materials Science
summary: Active learning (AL) plays a critical role in materials science, enabling applications such as the construction of machine-learning interatomic potentials for atomistic simulations and the operation of self-driving laboratories. Despite its widespread use, the reliability and effectiveness of AL workflows depend on implicit design assumptions that are rarely examined systematically. Here, we critically assess AL workflows deployed in materials science and investigate how key design choices, such as surrogate models, sampling strategies, uncertainty quantification and evaluation metrics, relate to their performance. By identifying common pitfalls and discussing practical mitigation strategies, we provide guidance to practitioners for the efficient design, assessment, and interpretation of AL workflows in materials science.
